1: הַ֥לְלוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>Praise</n> יָ֨הּ ׀ <sup>3050 </sup> <n>ye the LORD</n> אַשְׁרֵי־ <sup>835 </sup> <n>Blessed</n> אִ֭ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>[is] the man</n> יָרֵ֣א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>[that] feareth</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בְּ֝מִצְוֹתָ֗יו <sup>4687 </sup> <n>in his commandments</n> חָפֵ֥ץ <sup>2654 </sup> <n>[that] delighteth</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>greatly</n>
2: גִּבּ֣וֹר <sup>1368 </sup> <n>shall be mighty</n> בָּ֭אָרֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon earth</n> יִהְיֶ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> זַרְע֑וֹ <sup>2233 </sup> <n>His seed</n> דּ֭וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>the generation</n> יְשָׁרִ֣ים <sup>3477 </sup> <n>of the upright</n> יְבֹרָֽךְ׃ <sup>1288 </sup> <n>shall be blessed</n>
3: הוֹן־ <sup>1952 </sup> <n>Wealth</n> וָעֹ֥שֶׁר <sup>6239 </sup> <n>and riches</n> בְּבֵית֑וֹ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>[shall be] in his house</n> וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>and his righteousness</n> עֹמֶ֥דֶת <sup>5975 </sup> <n>endureth</n> לָעַֽד׃ <sup>5703 </sup> <n>for ever</n>
4: זָ֘רַ֤ח <sup>2224 </sup> <n>there ariseth</n> בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>in the darkness</n> א֭וֹר <sup>216 </sup> <n>light</n> לַיְשָׁרִ֑ים <sup>3477 </sup> <n>Unto the upright</n> חַנּ֖וּן <sup>2587 </sup> <n>[he is] gracious</n> וְרַח֣וּם <sup>7349 </sup> <n>and full of compassion</n> וְצַדִּֽיק׃ <sup>6662 </sup> <n>and righteous</n>
5: טֽוֹב־ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>A good</n> אִ֭ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>man</n> חוֹנֵ֣ן <sup>2603 </sup> <n>sheweth favour</n> וּמַלְוֶ֑ה <sup>3867 </sup> <n>and lendeth</n> יְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <sup>3557 </sup> <n>he will guide</n> דְּבָרָ֣יו <sup>1697 </sup> <n>his affairs</n> בְּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>with discretion</n>
6: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לְעוֹלָ֥ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>for ever</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִמּ֑וֹט <sup>4131 </sup> <n>Surely he shall not be moved</n> לְזֵ֥כֶר <sup>2143 </sup> <n>remembrance</n> ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>shall be in everlasting</n> יִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> צַדִּֽיק׃ <sup>6662 </sup> <n>the righteous</n>
7: מִשְּׁמוּעָ֣ה <sup>8052 </sup> <n>tidings</n> רָ֭עָה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>of evil</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>He will not</n> יִירָ֑א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>He shall not be afraid</n> נָכ֥וֹן <sup>3559 </sup> <n>is fixed</n> לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>his heart</n> בָּטֻ֥חַ <sup>982 </sup> <n>trusting</n> בַּיהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n>
8: סָמ֣וּךְ <sup>5564 </sup> <n>[is] established</n> לִ֭בּוֹ <sup>3820 </sup> <n>His heart</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>he will not</n> יִירָ֑א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>he shall not be afraid</n> עַ֖ד <sup>5704 </sup> <n>Until</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>he</n> יִרְאֶ֣ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>until he see</n> בְצָרָֽיו׃ <sup>6862 </sup> <n>[his desire] upon his enemies</n>
9: פִּזַּ֤ר ׀ <sup>6340 </sup> <n>He hath dispersed</n> נָ֘תַ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>he hath given</n> לָאֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים <sup>34 </sup> <n>to the poor</n> צִ֭דְקָתוֹ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>his righteousness</n> עֹמֶ֣דֶת <sup>5975 </sup> <n>endureth</n> לָעַ֑ד <sup>5703 </sup> <n>for ever</n> קַ֝רְנ֗וֹ <sup>7161 </sup> <n>his horn</n> תָּר֥וּם <sup>7311 </sup> <n>shall be exalted</n> בְּכָבֽוֹד׃ <sup>3519 </sup> <n>with honour</n>
10: רָ֘שָׁ֤ע <sup>7563 </sup> <n>The wicked</n> יִרְאֶ֨ה ׀ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall see</n> וְכָעָ֗ס <sup>3707 </sup> <n>[it] and be grieved</n> שִׁנָּ֣יו <sup>8127 </sup> <n>with his teeth</n> יַחֲרֹ֣ק <sup>2786 </sup> <n>he shall gnash</n> וְנָמָ֑ס <sup>4549 </sup> <n>and melt away</n> תַּאֲוַ֖ת <sup>8378 </sup> <n>the desire</n> רְשָׁעִ֣ים <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <sup>6 </sup> <n>shall perish</n>
